mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Would be happy to receive General Moreau at Monticello if dates can be worked out to avoid "my visits to Bedford 3 or 4 times a year." Mr. Threshly has been at Monticello to negotiate purchase of Short's land, but price continues to be a problem. Looks forward to receiving a copy of Abbe Rochon's memoir.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 April 26, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to [William] Short, n.p.
